com.upsight.android.marketing

Class UpsightBillboardHandlers.FullscreenHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.upsight.android.marketing.UpsightBillboardHandlers.FullscreenHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    UpsightBillboard.Handler
    Enclosing class:
    UpsightBillboardHandlers

    public static class UpsightBillboardHandlers.FullscreenHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    An UpsightBillboard.Handler implementation that displays the marketing content in a full-screen window when the content view becomes available.

    • Method Detail

      • onAttach

        public android.view.ViewGroup onAttach(java.lang.String scope,
                              UpsightBillboard.PresentationStyle presentation,
                              java.util.Set<UpsightBillboard.Dimensions> dimensions)
        Description copied from interface: UpsightBillboard.Handler
        Called when marketing content becomes available. This method is called only once if a ViewGroup is returned as the root view. If a piece of marketing content is skipped by returning null, then this callback is still eligible to be called when new marketing content becomes available.
        Parameters:
        scope - The scope associated with the UpsightBillboard.
        presentation - The preferred presentation styles for the marketing content view. This serves as a hint, which the client implementation may choose to respect or ignore.
        dimensions - The preferred dimensions for the marketing content view. This serves as a hint, which the client implementation may choose to respect or ignore.
        Returns:
        The root view where the marketing content is to be inserted. Return null to skip this piece of marketing content without displaying anything.
